Chest of the Halfling Rebels
Type: Container

A battle hardened chest that looks like it has seen the fighting spirit of the Halfling Rebels.

Chest of the Halfling Rebels is an openable treasury item. It can be received as rewards from Job Boards and Faction Reputation.

Loot Tables

These are the sub-tables for the various materials, coins, and items that can come from these chests.

These treasury items take 4 independent loot rolls when they are opened.
